channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
channel.description:
> # [color=steblue] The Interrogator[/color] > **[color=steblue] Blue Dragon Social[/color]** > > **Day Ability (Truth Serum)** - Force a player to publicly confess who they visited last night. Their first message in the next 10 seconds will be prefixed with this confession. If they do not speak within 10 seconds, nothing will happen. _(1 use, shared with the nighttime **Truth Serum**. Refunded if the target is executed and flips as not BD or Fool)_ > > **Night Ability (Truth Serum)** - Force a player to publicly confess who they visited last night. Their first message the next day will be prefixed with this confession. Unseen and Neutrals will be notified if this ability was used on them. _(1 use, shared with the daytime **Truth Serum**. Refunded if the target is executed and flips as not BD or Fool)_ > >**Night Ability (Bluff)** - Send a player a fake notification that they are the victim of **Truth Serum.** Only affects Unseen or Neutral players. _(Infinite uses)_ > > > **Goal:** *Defeat the Unseen/Cult and any neutrals who seek to do you harm.*
> # [color=purple] The Blackmailer[/color] > **[color=purple] Unseen Social[/color]** > > **Day Ability (Extort)** - If a player's investigative check returns Unseen, prevent them from speaking or voting all day and notify them of this. _(Infinite uses - credit to Firekitten)_ > > **Day Ability (Truth Serum)** - Force a player to publicly confess who they visited last night. Their first message in the next 10 seconds will be prefixed with this confession. If they do not speak within 10 seconds, nothing will happen. > > **Night Ability (Blackmail)** - Notify a player that they have been blackmailed. If they speak or vote today, they will be framed tonight. The Blackmailer will decide which faction and class type to frame them as. _(Infinite uses - credit to Firekitten)_ > > **Goal:** *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals who seek to do you harm.*

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I am talking about it’s value as a defense

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
But if two cult collaborate to confirm one of themselves, it actually confirms both (the fake visits of one, and the fake interrogator claim of the other)

so there are upsides in addition to the downsides you point out

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Yes I know. But this class can be confirmed during the day (less so now but BMer isn’t relevant for a fake claim) while the Hunter can only be confirmed at night. That outweighs being non-unique by far

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
On the bright side, there can be two Interrogators in a game

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Cool. He is a bit more confirmable than a Hunter btw

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
Okay I think that’s a great idea

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Also remember. We are not asking you to rework or remove the ability. I just think the blackmailer should have it too in order to reduce the odds of it being used like that

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
The point is that if you are accused and can’t truth serum someone then you are confirmed scum.

That sort of meta is self-limiting though. Evils will demand every outed Interrogator to confirm himself immediately, until real Interrogators simply refuse to blow their single-use ability on obvious baits and it won’t be so suspicious for real Interrogators to refuse to do it anymore.

And if you can serum a confirmed BD (or even the accuser) then you can shut down any accusation on you.

Yeah, but a real Interrogator will still be less likely to agree to that than a Noble would with force vote, for example. And if you do actually do it, you become a citizen and ripe for conversion.

You both have good points but I still think, because of what I explained, that this class is still a decent fake claim. At least better than Noble and Mystic.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
That’s more confirmable than Hunter.

The point is that if you are accused and can’t truth serum someone then you are confirmed scum. And if you can serum a confirmed BD (or even the accuser) then you can shut down any accusation on you.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
It’s extremely easy for a fake Interrogator to “Truth Serum” one of his own Unseen. So even if a real Interrogator yolo confirms himself D2, he won’t be believed, and if he is, he will become nothing more than a citizen that gets converted at some point.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Yes you would. People thought merc wouldn’t use decide fate pardon to confirm themselves yet they did.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
I’m not being sarcastic. Truth Serum is your main ability and it’s literally 1 use unless your target is hung that day or executed by Prince that night. You’re not going to waste it just to prove yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
I hope you are being sarcastic.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Shrimpy:

Day Ability (Truth Serum) - Force a player to publicly confess who they visited last night. Their first message in the next 10 seconds will be prefixed with this confession. If they do not speak within 10 seconds, nothing will happen. (1 use, shared with the nighttime Truth Serum . Refunded if the target is executed and flips as not BD or Fool)

I didn’t say that. He’s proven then

Shrimpy:

Night Ability (Truth Serum) - Force a player to publicly confess who they visited last night. Their first message the next day will be prefixed with this confession. Unseen and Neutrals will be notified if this ability was used on them. (1 use, shared with the daytime Truth Serum . Refunded if the target is executed and flips as not BD or Fool)

He’s also proven.

Don’t forget about the thing That notifies you.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
I actually put a lot of effort trying to make sure it’s a good fake claim. Please explain how it’s a bad fake claim?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I’d start pointing out how confirmable this class is if it weren’t for the fact that it is clearly not trying to be a good fake claim.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: santana
item.description:
Honestly, this is one of the most interesting classes I ever seen here, looks really fun to play as and challenging to play against, especially against the Blackmailer, if you out yourself as princess or sheriff, he can really screw you up

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
I fear that would encourage spamming “can you guys read this or am i being extorted?” everytime someone thinks they are being ignored in chat.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.description:
Shrimpy:

Day Ability (Extort) - If a player’s investigative check returns Unseen, prevent them from speaking or voting all day and notify them of this. (Infinite uses - credit to Firekitten)

Night Ability (Blackmail) - Notify a player that they have been blackmailed. If they speak or vote today, they will be framed tonight. The Blackmailer will decide which faction and class type to frame them as. (Infinite uses - credit to Firekitten)

Why not make it so you the target can only talk to you and they wont be notified? LUL. Nice job tho

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.description:
Really like the concept but it’s too complex to add if you know I mean.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
Are you sure it’s really a problem though? He has exactly one use. If he uses it to publicly confirm himself, he is useless for the rest of the game aside from speaking in chat and voting. On top of this, all evils know this. Interrogators will be far less confirmable than Noble and Mystic, in my opinion. But if you still disagree please let me know.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Interrogator / The Blackmailer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Wait. Truth serum is confimable in a way that BMer can’t replicate. Give the BMer the serum

Read full topic

Oh okay done
